Package org.openadaptor.util

miscellaneous utility classes

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IRegistrationCallbackListener Trivial callback to allow asyn calls to registration utilities.
SystemUtil.AdminMBean  
 

Class Summary
Application core functionality that is desirable for applications, outputs license, loads build properties and if configured posts all the system properties to a url.
ClassUtils  
FileUtils Some useful helper methods to centralise common functions
JDBCUtil  
JVMNeutralMBeanServerFactory Utility class to shield fact that 1.4 cannot reference java.lang.management classes.
NetUtil Common Resource Utilities for OA3
ObjectCloner Utility class which provides a generic cloning mechanism.
PropertiesPoster Adaptor registration is a process for collecting active adaptor information in a central location.
PropsUtils Helper methods for use with Java properties files
ProxyChecker Utility class to provide access to Spring AOP proxy class.
RegexFilenameFilter Regular Expression Filename Filter implementation
ResourceUtil

SystemProperties

SystemUtils A set of helper methods relating to the system and environment
